Key Match Events: Reid Detmers struck out 10 batters in his return to the Majors, including Shohei Ohtani looking with a 3-2 fastball in the fifth
Pre-Game Insights: The Angels were hopeful that Reid Detmers had turned the corner after a tumultuous season with a 5.54 ERA in 14 starts at Triple-A
Post-Match Reflections: Reid Detmers was happy to be back in the Majors and was glad to have had the opportunity to face a tough Dodgers lineup in his first game back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers eventually scored four times in the 10th, including a three-run homer from Mookie Betts after an intentional walk to Ohtani
Others: Detmers' four-seamer averaged 93.8 mph, and his slider generated eight swinging strikes, and he retired the last 11 batters he faced, including Will Smith on a strikeout
